ygData.subject: 60 Warrior and 49 Druid for Sale ! Ebay no longer permits selling EQ accounts :(
ygData.msgSnippet: If you are interested in this account, please e-mail me: lastnovelty@yahoo.com Thank you, Sincerely yours, Andrei lastnovelty@yahoo.com Currently he has all
ygData.messageBody:
If you are interested in this account, please e-mail me: lastnovelty@...

Thank you,
Sincerely yours,
Andrei
lastnovelty@...

Currently he has all the best pieces of warrior plane armor. And is only
missing 2 pieces for a full suit of cobolt. Ogre warriors are by far the
BEST warrior class, you'll never be stunned again while in combat. What
other warrior can boast that? =) When your tired of looking like the normal
twink ogre warriors running around these days, just click the mask and turn
into a dark elf.


ARMOR



Sarnak Earring of Station x2 ( 5 AC, +5 STR) UBER RARE
Ry`Gorr Chain Collar ( 2.8 WT, 9 AC, +10 MANA, +4 STA, +4 SV MAGIC)
Sarnak-Hide Mask ( 0.4 WT, 6 AC, +5 STR)
Cobalt Helm ( 10 WT, 25 AC, EFF: SERPENT SIGHT) UBER RARE
Cobalt Boots ( 6.5 WT, 25 AC, EFF: STRENGTH OF THE KUNZAR) very rare
Cobalt Vambraces ( 6.5 WT, 25 AC, EFF: LESSER SHIELDING) very rare
Cobalt Bracer ( 4 WT, 20 AC, EFF: SHRINK) UBER RARE

+15 SV POISON)From Hate

HASTE)VERY RARE from Air

MISC INFO

All his weapon and fighting skills are maxed, execpt 2 hand blunt which is
right around 240.

He has a couple 1000 plats in the bank.

The picture below shows him buffed with only his buffs. 1100 AC is the cap
and he has 1103!

He has a FULL set of FIRE, COLD, and POISON Gear for VOX NAG and TRAK

Too many more mid level items too list, 4 RMB's, TBB, crown of frog kings,
etc etc

OTHER CHARACTERS

lvl 49 halfling druid - with 196 WIS, GREAT for power leveling and using as
a trade mule/teleport guy.
